column1: Smoque BBQ////Came here on a Saturday evening and didn't have to wait very long in line.  Woohoo!  I got a pulled pork platter
column2: which comes with coleslaw and two sides (BBQ beans and mac and cheese).  The pulled pork was very tender and flavorful
column3: but the temperature was on the cool side
column4: so that was kind of disappointing.  The coleslaw was not my favorite - I didn't really like the dressing - but it provided a refreshing crunch.  The BBQ beans were very good.  Sweet
column7: piping hot.  The mac and cheese was good too (and topped with breadcrumbs!)
column8: but I think I'll try the fries next time.  My companions said that the brisket chili was fine but nothing to write home about.  Next time
column9: I'll have to try the other meats - ribs
column12: and Texas sausage (which I thought was called Elgin sausage in Texas?) - I was playing it safe this time.
